donor_name: Ministry of labour  social affairs and family of the Slovak
outputs.output_descr:
The current project will promote establishment and development of the social economy sector as a tool for supporting a wide framework of socio-economic issues such as job creation, social innovation, social inclusion and community development in Slovakia. In partnership with international and local level organizations, new approaches to delivery of general-interest services, employment of vulnerable groups, civil society sustainability and building of social capital will be pursued.
1. Enabling legal and regulatory environment for social economy development created
2. Sustainability and organisational, institutional and adaptive capacities of community-based social enterprises enhanced
3. Knowledge and awareness of different national stakeholders on benefits of social economy increased

project_title: Social Economy: Innovative model of economic development
